HAVE A QUESTION? WE HOPE

settings.rich_text:
Here are some questions commonly received by our Customer Service Team:

I placed an order through your online store, when will I receive it?

You will receive an email notification with a tracking link as soon as your order ships. For more information about ship times please click here.

Is GU packaging recyclable?

We have partnered with TerraCycleâ„¢ in an effort to keep as much sports nutrition packaging out of landfill as possible. TerraCycle is a highly-awarded, international upcycling and recycling company that collects difficult-to-recycle packaging and products and repurposes the material into affordable, innovative products. To find out more and to join the program please click here.

Have question about a specific product?

You can head to the product page to see if your question is answered in the FAQ section there.
